articles.title: Fire at Swiss Alpine resort bar during New Year’s celebration leaves dozens feared dead, 100 injured
articles.description: CRANS-MONTANA, Switzerland (AP) — A fire ripped through a bar’s New Year celebration in a Swiss Alpine resort less than two hours after midnight Thursday, with dozens of people feared dead and about 100 more injured, most seriously, police said.
